thread.title: Politicians React To Joe Biden's 2016 Announcement
thread.title_full: Politicians React To Joe Biden's 2016 Announcement - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Politicians React To Joe Biden's 2016 Announcement
text: Vice President Joe Biden announced Wednesday he would not run for president in 2016. President Barack Obama and Dr. Jill Biden stood by him during the announcement. As Biden revealed the news, political figures from both sides reacted to his decision.
